data.title: Technical Program
data.meta_description: Full Schedule and Program for IMAGE 2024
data.text: The technical program consists of over 1200 presentations, with 159 oral sessions and 155 poster sessions. It is organized into two main themes: Geophysical and Geological Technology, and E&P in Geographic Regions. The program covers 6 geographic regions, 4 geological technology topics, 13 geophysical technology topics, and 9 integrated topics. The new format aims to bring scientists from different disciplines together to learn about the activities within and outside their primary technical discipline. Additionally, 19 Special Sessions covering both geology and geophysics will be included. The technical program is scheduled to start on Tuesday at 8:00 a.m. and will continue through Thursday until 4:50 p.m.
